description: This file contains unit tests for the TextFragment class and related classes in the WPEFramework Core library, verifying string segment parsing and manipulation functionalities using Google Test framework.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text, supporting various string manipulations and segment operations.

classes.name: TextSegmentIterator
classes.description: An iterator class for traversing segments within a TextFragment, supporting delimiters and navigation.

methods.name: Remainder
methods.description: Returns the remaining part of the TextFragment after current position.

methods.name: Text
methods.description: Returns the string content of the TextFragment.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Advances the iterator to the next segment.

methods.name: OnMarker
methods.description: Checks if the TextFragment contains a specific marker string.

methods.name: EqualText
methods.description: Checks if the TextFragment's text matches a provided string.

methods.name: TrimBegin
methods.description: Removes the specified prefix from the TextFragment if present.

methods.name: TrimEnd
methods.description: Removes the specified suffix from the TextFragment if present.

methods.name: ReverseFind
methods.description: Finds the last occurrence of a substring or pattern.

methods.name: ReverseSkip
methods.description: Skips backwards to find a specific pattern.
